name: King
ability: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows you are the King.

legacy.firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon. Show the King token and point to the King.
legacy.otherNightReminder: If the dead equal or outnumber the living: Show the King a character token of a living player.

firstNight.description: The Demon knows you are the King.

otherNights.description: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character.

information.customMessage: If dead >= living, learn an alive character.
